import axios from 'axios'; import React,{useState} from 'react' import { NavBar } from '../components/NavBar' import { Banner } from '../components/banner' import {Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import { DynDropDown } from '../components/dynDropDown' export const StudentDashboard = () => { const [academicYear, setAcademicYear] = useState('') const [semester, setSemester] = useState('') const [courseDetails, setCourseDetails] = useState('') const [response, setResponse] = useState('') const sendFeedback = async () => { var data = { facultyUserName: window.sessionStorage.getItem('username'), academicYear: academicYear, semester: semester, courseId: courseDetails.split('-')[1], courseName: courseDetails.split('-')[0], } const { data: res } = await axios.post('addFeedBack', data) setResponse(res.message) } return (
Student's DashBoard
Generate Course CO Feedback Add Course
) }
